QueryDefinition.Query:
with l as ( SELECT distinct patient_state, patient_zip3 FROM {sc}.enrollment where patient_zip3 is not null and patient_zip3 != '' )
select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY patient_state, patient_zip3) AS Id, patient_state, patient_zip3, case when patient_state is not null or patient_state != '' then patient_state || '_' || patient_zip3 else patient_zip3 end source_value from l
